response.overview: Gachiakuta is a gritty Japanese dark fantasy manga/anime about Rudo, a boy from the slums of a floating city who is framed for murder, cast into a massive trash-filled abyss (the Pit) below, and must fight monsters made of discarded items to survive and seek revenge, uncovering a world where trash and people are equally devalued by the rich elite.
response.tagline: Overthrow the status quo and change the world
response.title: Gachiakuta
